<:WTT:711683426469544006> <:WTS:708489317168971778> PokÃ©mon Crystal: $95  Received this one from someone who said it wasn't being read by their Game Boy. I inspected it and found a rotted-out trace on the back of the board. I repaired the trace and the neighboring via and sealed everything with solder mask. Please refer to the photos for the repair. The game was also missing a label, so I used one of the super cool clear labels from Next Stop Please.

If interested in trades; I'm looking for that BDSP Lite.  I'm also looking for PokÃ©mon Pearl (DS) CIB, PokÃ©mon Black, and PokÃ©mon Black 2.
